name: Marcus Trigell
body:
# Welcome to my page  
This is a page about me and what i have done related to Software Engineering. 

## About me  
I'm a guy who loves everything computer-related.  
I currently live in Uddevalla in Sweden with my wife and our lovely daughter.
I'm studying Software Engineering at [Chalmers University of Technology](http://www.chalmers.se/sv/Sidor/default.aspx) which i've been studying since august 2013.  

## Projects  
Some projects i've been working on through Chalmers are:  
* An [movie-search app for Android](https://github.com/axelniklasson/blue-java).   
* A music player for Volvo Trucks implemented in Android with NHTSA-guidelines and vehicle safety as main priority.    This was a project in collaboration with Volvo, Swedspot and some other companies at Lindholmen Science Park in Gothenburg and the source code is private unfortunately.  

## Contact
I prefer being contacted by e-mail but Social Media sites are also ok:  
marcustrigell AT gmail.com  
trigell AT student.chalmers.se  
[LinkedIn](https://se.linkedin.com/pub/marcus-trigell/b8/52/7b)  
[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/marcus.trigell)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
